info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 1:33PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Steuben County through 200 PM EDT... At 132 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Angola, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Angola around 145 PM EDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 344 and 354. Interstate 80 in Indiana near mile marker 135, and between mile markers 154 and 155. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
